name: pjadj2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wceq(cfv(cado, c0), c0), wcel(c0, cho))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ ran(projh), (adjh ` c0)= c0, c0 ∈ HrmOp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wceq(cfv(cado, c0), c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wcel(c0, cho))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cho), wceq(cfv(cado, c0), c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)→(adjh ` c0)= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)→ c0 ∈ HrmOp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ HrmOp →(adjh ` c0)= c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wceq(cfv(cado, c0), c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wcel(c0, cho))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cho), wceq(cfv(cado, c0), c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)→(adjh ` c0)= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)→ c0 ∈ HrmOp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ HrmOp →(adjh ` c0)= c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crn(cpjh)), wceq(cfv(cado, c0), c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cho), wceq(cfv(cado, c0), c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ran(projh)→(adjh ` c0)= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ HrmOp →(adjh ` c0)= c0)

comment: A projector is self-adjoint. Property (i) of [Beran] p. 109. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
